article_text:
GIft cards have boomed since their introduction in the mid-1990s. Total spending on gift cards last year topped $110 billion, with more than 267,000,000 gift card sales.

But despite the demand, a surprising number of cards go unused.

article_metadata.description: Year in and year out, gift cards are one of the most requested holiday presents. Total spending on gift cards last year reached $29 billion.
article_metadata.author: Izzy Best, CNBC News Associate

article_summary:
Total spending on gift cards last year topped $110 billion, with more than 267,000,000 gift card sales.
GIft cards have boomed since their introduction in the mid-1990s.
But despite the demand, a surprising number of cards go unused.
